item.title: Custom Domains Guide
item.description: So you want to point a custom domain at takahe.social? Great! Before you start, you need to understand a few things: Custom domains are limited to only our Featured Supporter Patreon Tier or higher, or those who donate an equivalent monthly amount via direct invoice (email contact@jointakahe.org for information about that option). Once you make accounts (identities) on your custom domain, you will not be able to move them away from takahe.
